Mesmerize.help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mesmerize.targetHelp: You have been Mesmerized and cannot act.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

Levitate.help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Levitate.targetHelp: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Dominate.help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.
Dominate.targetHelp: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.

Psychic_Shockwave.help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Shockwave.targetHelp: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Force_Bolt.help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals some Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Power_Blast.help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.targetHelp: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
